title: 3.7 Additive Waves
description: This video builds on the previous sine wave visualization in p5.js example. Here, I build a Wave class with variables for period, amplitude, and phase, and demonstrate how to add multiple wave patterns together!

timestamps.title: Explain! How do we make a wave class?
Explain! The formula we'll use for a wave.
Code! Let's make a wave class.
Explore! Why did we spend the time to make the wave class?
Ideas! I hope you try some of these ideas!

codeExamples.title: Additive Waves
codeExamples.description: Using a Wave class to trace a moving additive wave with ellipses
